Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for the money!
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: Is this the most advanced laptop available, No, but it is a Great laptop for how little it costs! Great Value!

Reviews.Title: This was returned.
Reviews.Author: Richard Petty "auto enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: The vendor did not send me the correct PC. It was a less powerful PC. Doubt they did it on purpose. Ended up with a deal on a Dell 5110 purchased 10-2-2012 from another vendor, not on/from Amazon. Having the hard drive in that replaced this week free under warranty. Purchased thru LogicBuy. THAT machine is a very nice unit.  In spite of the defective hard drive. 1 TG/500GB
